en.title: FE Expands in the USA!
en.content:
REPORT BY FE PRESIDENTIAL DIRECTOR PASTOR ART MEDINA.

With great excitement I am sending you this update with pictures of our initial FE USA Business Expansion Program!

The objectives of my trip in the USA are the following:

1. To soft launch the California State Licensee office under Mr Antonio Katigbak located at 3500 Callan Blvd
    Room 201 South San Francisco. 

2. To conduct Network Development Program trainings to leaders who are already starting the FE business
    on their own in different places in California, and Nevada, USA.

3. To conduct Business for Entrepreneurs Preview (BEP) in San Francisco, LA, San Diego, and Las Vegas,
    Nevada for selected potential leaders and guests.

4. To expose my family members composed of my wife PD Marlene, ED Jireh Karise, Keren Lois, and my
    7 year-old son Daveric Art to our FE BEP in the USA and to see some beautiful places here in this huge
    country.

Our LA based leaders had their 1st BEP in Celebrity Center in Hollywood area on April 15th. This was initiated by the group of our ED Art and Grace Tuason and Director Sita Yan.

On April 18th in San Francisco, California State Licensee, Mr. Tony Katigbak opened up the soft-launch with his own testimony on how he was able to conquer the stiff ups and down terrain of Baguio Golf and Country Club finishing 18 holes for the very first time after wearing FE's Quantum Pendant. He also shared how his daughter, who had a spine operation 3 years ago and had been walking with a cane since, is now walking normally without any cane after 2 weeks of wearing FE's QP! Because of his own experience with FE's Quantum Products, he decided to establish the California State Licensee office in San Francisco to reach out to all the people in California who need our Simple, Easy to explain, and Exciting products and its global business opportunity.

We also provided network development training support to Las Vegas group headed by Stockiest Director Benjie Cuaresma who is a U.S. registered nurse and organic fertilizer inventor but now focused on strategically building his FE power networks in Las Vegas, San Diego, Lake Elsinore and Wisconsin areas.

Overall, our U.S.A. Business Expansion Program was very successful, by God's grace. We are confident with the professional leadership of California State Licensee, Mr. Tony Katigabak and his team, Director Sita Yan, Stockist Benjamin Cuaresma, Beets, Stockist Gina Opilas in Chulavista, Ca. and emerging leaders in LA area like Techie Emperador, Bing, Art Bernardo, Jun and Cristy in Fontana and also new leaders in Chicago area. 

My special thanks to our FE members, retired US Navy Celso R. Monserrat, Dr Carol Monserrat for total hospitality right in their home in Murrieta, Ca. Also for Aunt Vicky Henson, uncle Boy Rellosa, and Javic Sanchez for logistics support.

This two week network development trip is just the beginning of building FE's power networks in the USA!!!

We shall return! AHOO! AHOO! AHOO!!! 



Celebrity Center 1st BEP Group.
Celebrity Center BEP Hollywood.
BEP Pax in Celebrity Center.
Soft-launch in San Francisco.
At Celebrity Centre BEP, Hollywood.
At Celebrity Centre BEP, Hollywood.
At Celebrity Centre BEP, Hollywood.
At Celebrity Centre BEP, Hollywood.
BEP in San Francisco.
ED Jireh Karise, Keren Lois with 
Billy Crawford in LAX.
Gina Opilas Chulavista Stockist.
Lake Elsinore, CA.
Las Vegas.
PD Pastor Art, PD Marlene and ED Art Tuason.
